comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Samuel J. Hood had one of his photos of this event published in the Melbourne 'Argus' - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/3890173 - described as Monday 7th November 1927. The pontoon and sheerlegs belonged to the Sydney Harbour Trust.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] It's a shame we don't have photographs of the wreck being lifted out of the water. When you think about it, all those photographs were probably bought by the newspapers. Thanks for the link, great research!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
